name: Block Puzzle - Free Block Games
description:
Once you start, you will never stop!

Offline and FREE game! Play anytime, anywhere!
Kill time while waiting for friends!
Relax and stay away from stress!

How to play?
- Drag the blocks to place them on the grid.
- If it is filled vertically or horizontally, the row will be deleted.
- If there is no room for more blocks, the game is over.
-eliminate as many things as possible!

Why you should choose us?
- No internet required.
- 8X8, 10X10 CLASSIC modes.
- ARCADE mode: Rotation, Bomb, Changing Blocks!
- BLOCKDOKU mode: Block and sudoku mix.
- More than 11 languages support!
This game has language support '한국어', 'English', '日本語', '中文 简体', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'Русский', 'Portuguese', 'Turkish', 'Italian' .

Please contact us if you have any questions.
